text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Making a comeback?  We are. sinking because of your lack of leadership. 54000 cases in 24 hours. In My home state of Texas hospitals are full. COVID-19 SARS2 is now the Trump Virus! THE TRUMP VIRUS! THE Trump VIRUS!  Did you comprehend? I repeated 3 times for you.THE TRUMP VIRUS
